2. Settings¶

Contents

  • 2.1. Back-end Requests
  • 2.2. Initialisation
  • 2.3. Events
  • 2.4. Variables
settings.accountCancel()¶

Reverts account to cached settings and hides the save button.

Invoked by
settings.init.attachAllListeners() settings.event.accountCancelMobile()
settings.accountInputsCheck()¶

Checks for changes in account settings.

Invokes
global.input.checkChange()
Invoked by
settings.init.attachAllListeners()
settings.badgeConfigMenuClose()¶

Closes the badge configuration menu.

Invoked by
settings.event.badgeConfigMenuSave() settings.event.badgeConfigMenuEscape() settings.event.badgeConfigMenuCancel()
settings.badgeConfigMenuShow()¶

Shows the configure badge menu when the preview badge container is clicked.

Invoked by
settings.init.attachAllListeners() settings.init.sessionStorageCheck()
settings.badgesCancel()¶

TO DO

settings.cacheUpdate(section)¶

Updates the cache with current inputs.

Invoked by
settings.backend.profileSave() settings.backend.badgesSave() settings.backend.accountSave() settings.backend.notificationsSave()
settings.editModeExit(selected)¶

Exits editing mode for selected and returns the user to the main Settings page if on mobile.

Invoked by
settings.event.sectionClick() settings.event.profileCancelMobile() settings.event.accountCancelMobile() settings.event.notificationsCancelMobile()
Arguments

  • selected (Object) – A section container.

settings.notificationsCancel()¶

Reverts notifications to cached settings and hides the save button.

Invoked by
settings.init.attachAllListeners() settings.event.notificationsCancelMobile()
settings.notificationsInputsCheck()¶

Checks for changes in notifications settings.

Invokes
global.input.checkChange()
Invoked by
settings.init.attachAllListeners()
settings.profileCancel()¶

Reverts profile to cached settings and hides the save button.

Invoked by
settings.init.attachAllListeners()
settings.profileInputsCheck()¶

Checks for changes in profile settings.

Invokes
global.input.checkChange()
Invoked by
settings.init.attachAllListeners()
